column1: defends to the off side to short extra cover.
in the block-hole, squeezed out to the onside.
cut hard behind point.
pulls to deep midwicket.

driven firmly to extra cover.
arm ball, pulls and gets an inside edge onto the legs.
uses his feet and strikes the pad first and then onto the bat.
pushes to the onside, half stopped by the short midwicket fielder.
pushes to the onside and fielder by Samit.
works to the onside.
plays it down to thirdman.
pushes to the off side to cover.
hit hard back down the track, deflects away of Shaheen's leg and Weise was going the wrong way at mid-off, goes through to the fence.
full toss driven to mid-off, Weise does well to quickly move and strikes the stumps, wonderful fielding, Sharjeel is run out.
fuller and driven straight past the bowler to the fence, this time Shaheen could not get his leg to stop it.
tucks to the onside.
pushes to the onside to mid-on.
forces off the back foot to the extra cover fence.
dropped at short thirdman by Hafeez, made room to drive.
pulled away through the onside.
punches through the off side to cover.
punches to extra cover and Dunk does well.
drops it short and pulled away forward of square leg to the fence.
pushes to the off side.
uses his feet and one bounce to the long on fence.
full toss smashed in the gap to the extra cover fence.
drops it short and driven through covers to the fence.
works it through the vacant midwicket to the deep.
tucks it to deep backward square leg.
pushes to the onside to mid-on, scampers through for a single.
pushes back down the track.
plays it down to thirdman.
driven on the up and through covers to the fence.
hit in the air over to the wide long off fence.
pulls to wide long on, a misfield by Dunk allows the second.
works to the onside to midwicket.
pushes to the off side to mid-off.
pushes to the off side and Samit moves across to his left and fields.
backs away and cuts to the backward point fence.
turns it through midwicket.
plays gently behind the wicket on the off side.
driven well through the off side to the extra cover fence, brings up the 50 runs partnership.

slower delivery driven to mid-off.
slashed hard behind point.
short and he is on the back foot pulls well over the backward square leg fence.
short ball pulled to deep square leg.
tosses it up, spins away as he drives.
driven down the ground to long off.
drops it to the onside, fielders in quickly.
first wicket for Maaz in PSL, tossed up wide and driven in the air to extra cover and the youngster has struck, well done young man.
plays to cover and gets off the mark.
stays back and defends.
flicks it in the air through the vacant midwicket.
punches down the ground to long on.
works it through midwicket.
turns it through square leg to the deep.

hit in the air down the ground to long on.

on the bounce to Weise at long on.
punches through extra cover to the deep.

tossed up wide and played through extra cover.
pushes down the ground through mid-on.

full toss pushed through mid-on.

punches down the ground through mid-on.

swings it over the midwicket fence.
driven through the off side to deep point.
steered to short thirdman, a misfield.

moves across to the off side and scoops it over short fine leg to the fence.

flicks it high in the air to deep midwicket, Fakhar takes it and then tosses it up as he crossed the ropes and then gets back in to take it, infact as he took the catch with one hand, he had stepped on the boundary cushion, brilliant effort though. NOT OUT
drives and misses.
swings it high in the air over the midwicket fence.
drives through the off side to deep extra cover, brings up his 50.

full and wide, dabs to short thirdman.

down the leg side from round the wicket.

misses the full toss and strikes him on the pad, loud appeal and given, Hales reviews it immediately, struck him outside the line. NOT OUT.
driven along the ground to the sweeper cover.
full toss hits it high in the air over cow corner.
another one goes the distance, full toss outside the off stump and he dispatches it over the long on fence.

moves across to the off side and swings it high over the midwicket fence, that sounded wonderfully off the bat.

in the block-hole and squeezed out to the onside.

good ball to finish the over, makes room and he fires it wider outside the off stump, Hales could not do anything with it.
outside the off stump and left alone.
